contentList.content: The Warrior

The Warrior is the first Guardian Constellation and he protects his charges during their Seasons. The Warrior's own season is Last Seed, when his Strength is needed for the harvest. His charges are the Lady, the Steed, and the Lord. Those born under the sign of the Warrior are skilled with weapons of all kinds, but prone to short tempers.
Warwyrd
Those born under the sign of the Warrior may add their Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to their weapon attack damage once per short rest.
The Mage

The Mage is a Guardian Constellation who's Season is Rain's Hand, when Magicka was first used by mankind. His charges are the Apprentice, the Atronach, and the Ritual. Those born under the Mage have more Magicka and talent for all kinds of spellcasting, but are often arrogant and absent-minded.
Fay
Those born under the sign of the Mage have the power to restore <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Those born under the sign of the Mage have the power to restore a Level [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Fay (Level 1)
Fay (Level 2)
Fay (Level 3)
The Thief

The Thief is the last Guardian Constellation, and her Season is the darkest month of Evening Star. Her charges are the Lover, the Shadow, and the Tower. Those born under the sign of the Thief are not typically thieves, though they take risks more often and only rarely come to harm. They will run out of luck eventually, however, and rarely live as long as those born under other signs.
Hara

Those born under the sign of the Thief can make a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag>. If they already know Sneak Attack, they have an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SneakAttack_Charge">Sneak Attack Charge</LSTag>.
The Lady
The Lady is one of the Warrior's charges, and her Season is Hearthfire. Those born under the sign of the Lady are kind and tolerant.
Lady's Favor
Those born under the sign of the Lady may add twice their Level to their <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> when levelling up.
The Steed
The Steed is one of the Warrior's charges, and her Season is Mid Year. Those born under the sign of the Steed are impatient, and always hurrying from one place to another.
Charioteer
Those born under the sign of the Steed gain an additional [1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>.
Trollkin

Those born under the sign of the Lord are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Fire. They also gain the power <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_BloodOfTheNorth">Blood of the North</LSTag>, which allows them to regenerate health.
The Lord
The Lord's Season is First Seed, and he oversees all of Tamriel during the planting. Those born under the sign of the Lord are stronger and healthier than those born under other signs.
Elfborn
You are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Magical attacks. You also gain an additional 1st Level <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>, and receive the spell Thunderwave.
The Apprentice
The Apprentice's Season is Sun's Height. Those born under the sign of the Apprentice have a special affinity for magic of all kinds, but are equally as vulnerable to it.
The Ritual
You receive the powers of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_MarasGift">Mara's Gift</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_BlessedWord">Blessed Word</LSTag>.
Mooncalf

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Performance">Performance</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag>. You also have the power <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_LoversEmbrace">Lover's Embrace</LSTag>.
Moonshadow
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag>, and gain the power <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Moonshadow">Moonshadow</LSTag>.
Warden

Those born under the sign of the Tower have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight Of Hand</LSTag>, have the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_TowerKey">Tower Key</LSTag> power.
Blood of the North
Your Lordly blood heals you for 3 points at the beginning of each of your turns for the duration of the power.
Your Lordly blood is giving you [1] at the start of each turn.
Mara's Gift
Once per short or long rest, you may restore an amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> equal to [1].
Blessed Word
All <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Undead">undead</LSTag> within a [1] sphere within range are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TURNED">Turned</LSTag>.
Lover's Embrace
You reach out to embrace a creature. The target must make a Willpower <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against your <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>.
Moonshadow
When using this power, you and the items you carry are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
Tower Key
You may unlock any object locked by non-magical means.
Star-Curse
Once per long rest, you can inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> on a creature that you touch, causing them to take [1] per turn for the duration of the power.
Star-Cursed
You've been <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AGTT_STATUS_STARCURSE">cursed</LSTag> by one born under the sign of the Serpent. At the end of each turn, you take [1].
You've cursed a character with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AGTT_STATUS_STARCURSE">Star-Curse</LSTag>. You share in the pain, taking [1].
